text:
I have previously downloaded version 5.5.9 and 5.5.12 and 5.5.15 of tomcat 
source code and release of the binaries. I have found that the implementation 
of the GenericPrincipal class does not support the methods as suggested in the 
documentation ie. getUserPrincipal. in catalina.jar, the source code has the 
right implementation but I cannot find the implementation in 
GenericPrincipal.class.
creator: ia198@lineone.net
yoavs@computer.org
text:
We don't do any bytecode manipulation, and the method is in the class, so I'm
not sure why you're running into trouble.  Can you please post your test code
that looks for the method?

No response for almost two months and as Yoav's last comment indicates, the
method is there.
creator: markt@apache.org
